title: Did Tom Selleck Leave ‘Blue Bloods’ and Offer Some ‘Final Words’?
subtitle: The eleventh season of the Tom Selleck-led CBS television drama "Blue Bloods" premiered later than usual due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: Tom Selleck offered some final words before "leaving the stage forever" and will never again star in the television show "Blue Bloods."
